stage.name: Create Zip from Folder
stage.narrative: Creates a zip archive that contains the files and directories from the specified directory and optionally includes the base directory. The directory structure from the file system is preserved in the archive. If the directory is empty, an empty archive is created. If the archive already exists, an exception is thrown. If an entry with the specified name already exists in the archive, a second entry is created with an identical name. If a file in the directory cannot be added to the archive, the archive is left incomplete and invalid, and the method throws an exception.

input.name: Source Folder Name
input.narrative: Mandatory: The path to the directory to be archived, specified as an absolute path

input.name: Destination Zip File Name
input.narrative: Mandatory: The path and name of the archive to be created, specified as an absolute path

input.name: Include Base Folder
input.narrative: Optional: True to include the directory name from [Source Folder Name] at the root of the archive; False to include only the contents of the directory. Default False

input.name: Directory Path
input.narrative: The path in which to create the directory

input.name: Error If Already Exists
input.narrative: True to generate an error if the directory already exists

input.name: File Name
input.narrative: The full path of the text file to append to

input.name: Text
input.narrative: The text to append to the file

input.name: Directory Path
input.narrative: The path of the directory to delete

input.name: Error If Not Exists
input.narrative: Set True to raise an error if the path does not exist

input.name: Recursive
input.narrative: Set True to delete all sub-directories of the path aswell

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative: Create 3 files in the [Test Files Folder] and 1 file in the [Test Additional Files Folder]

input.name: Zip File Name
input.narrative: Mandatory: The path and name of the zip archive to open, specified as an absolute path

output.name: Contents
output.narrative: The files in the zip archive

field.name: Path
field.description: The file path within the zip archive

stage.name: Add File to Zip
stage.narrative: Archives a file by compressing it and adding it to the zip archive. If an entry with the specified name already exists in the archive, a second entry is created with an identical name.

input.name: Destination Zip File Name
input.narrative: Mandatory: The path and name of the archive to be created, specified as an absolute path

input.name: Source Folder Name

output.narrative: The files in the zip archive

decision.expression: InStr([Exception Message], "Could not execute code stage because exception thrown by code stage: The file") > 0 AND InStr([Exception Message], "already exists.") > 0

exception.detail: "Zip file already exists error didn't raise the expected exception"

decision.expression: [Exception Message] = "Could not execute code stage because exception thrown by code stage: The path is not of a legal form."

exception.detail: "Missing Parameters error didn't raise the expected exception"

decision.expression: [Exception Message] = "Could not execute code stage because exception thrown by code stage: Empty path name is not legal."

decision.expression: InStr([Exception Message], "Could not execute code stage because exception thrown by code stage: Could not find file") > 0

exception.detail: "Wrong parameters error didn't raise the expected exception"

decision.expression: InStr([Exception Message], "Could not execute code stage because exception thrown by code stage: Access to the path") > 0 AND InStr([Exception Message], "is denied.") > 0

exception.detail: "Corrupted Zip file error didn't raise the expected exception"

decision.expression: InStr([Exception Message], "Could not execute code stage because exception thrown by code stage: The file") > 0 AND InStr([Exception Message], "already exists.") > 0
